product_name: WTB WeirWolf 29er Light TCS Tire - 29 x 2.3
long_description: The updated WeirWolf foldable tire features an extra row of transitional tread between the crown and side knobs, delivering consistent traction at moderate or extreme angles, just right for any trail.
short_description: The updated WeirWolf foldable tire features an extra row of transitional tread between the crown and side knobs, delivering consistent traction at moderate or extreme angles, just right for any trail.
